How to Deploy via GitHub Pages

Follow these steps to deploy your casino website to GitHub Pages:

Create GitHub Repository

  1. Sign in to your GitHub account
  2. Click the "+" icon and select "New repository"
  3. Name your repository (e.g., dream-island-casino)
  4. Set visibility to "Public" (required for free hosting)
  5. Initialize with a README file
  6. Click "Create repository"

Upload Files

  1. In your repository, click "Add file" â†’ "Upload files"
  2. Drag and drop your HTML file (must be named index.html)
  3. Add any additional assets (images, CSS, JS)
  4. Commit changes with a descriptive message

Configure GitHub Pages

  1. Go to repository Settings
  2. In the left sidebar, click "Pages"
  3. Under "Source", select "Deploy from a branch"
  4. Set branch to "main" and folder to "/ (root)"
  5. Click "Save"

Access Your Site

  1. GitHub will build and deploy your site
  2. Wait a few minutes for deployment to complete
  3. Your site will be available at:
    https://username.github.io/repository-name
  4. Bookmark the URL to access your casino
